Title: Turbo
Genre: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Sci-Fi, Sport
Writer: Darren Lemke (screenplay by), Robert Siegel (screenplay by), David Soren (screenplay by), David Soren (story by)
Actors: Ryan Reynolds, Paul Giamatti, Michael Peña, Samuel L. Jackson
Plot: After a freak accident infuses him with the power of super-speed, Turbo kicks into overdrive and embarks on an extraordinary journey to achieve the seemingly impossible: competing in the world's fastest race, the Indianapolis 500. With the help of his tricked-out streetwise snail crew, this ultimate underdog puts his heart and shell on the line to prove that no dream is too big, and no dreamer too small.
